description: After creating a project, there is no command to change the project manager.  Auth manager needs a project modify command similar to the user modify method.  This can be exposed to nova -manage as well.
title: Can't change project manager after creation of project.

comments.content: After creating a project, there is no command to change the project manager.  Auth manager needs a project modify command similar to the user modify method.  This can be exposed to nova -manage as well.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: on further investigation it appears that this is only missing from nova-manage
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
